body: OK, I replaced the indoor view factor calculator and its input components from a previous working file, and it works now, strangely ... a new problem now for the microclimate mapping component with the error message of: **The calculation has been terminated by the user!** , although I didn't intervene at all .... May I have your advice on this problem? Thank you! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/k4uCoQpo4b7gXnRCLihwvQX0xTxbbgkXdDL8BN9-MAttY-3zMQ1xgxbl*4ftwXRz*WVmBYKy-yq8hpH7U6InEhpI3thed-Lx/Capture.PNG)
